attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the world of free market forces,the tax on veiwing media output is out dated and no longer warrented especialy if you don't  view the bbc's output

rejection.details:
There is already a very similar petition launched:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/bbcsubscription/
If you still wish for yours to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
